product_name: JVNTravel Size Complete Air Dry Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackInstantly defy frizz for 24 hours and treat your locks to soft, touchable hold with JVN's bestselling Air Dry Cream. Enhance your natural texture and add lush shine. Perfect for no-heat styles, diffuser curls, natural waves and light hold for all types and textures.
details: DetailsBenefitsAllows for easy, on-the-go, air dry stylingAnti-frizz ingredients promote all day smoothnessDefines like a curl cream to enhance all texturesBuildable formulation allows untimate control over hold strengthKey IngredientsCHIA AND LINSEED EXTRACTS Naturally derived texture enhancers work together to add lasting, touchable hold.HEMISQUALANE Derived from bio-fermented sugarcane helps improve hair health and strength instantly and over time.MORINGA SEED OIL Adds lush, lightweight hydration for softness, shine and dazzling luster.Research ResultsInstantly Reduces Frizz by 97%*Provides 24-hour frizz control*97% say Air Dry Cream adds hold without stiffness ****Based on a 21 day consumer study of 35 subjects, 3x weekly use*In a controlled hair swatch study, after one useItem 2643067How To UseApply to palms and rub together before gently smoothing down damp midshaft and ends, lightly applying remaining product to roots.JVN Tip: Start with a pea sized amount if your hair is finer, straighter or if you just desire less hold. Air dry or diffuse and live your best life. Can also be used on dry hair for day-two frizz freedom.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance/Parfum** *Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane **Fragrance/Parfum; Prenyl Acetate 2,6-Dimethylheptan-2-ol, Octanal, Hexenyl Acetate, p-Cresol, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Dipropylene Glycol, 2,6-Dimethyl-7-Octen-2-ol, 2,4-Dimethyl-3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Allyl Caproate, Methyl Benzoate, Linalool, Phenethyl Alcohol, 2,4,6-Neocyclocitral, Benzyl Acetate, Terpineol, Methylbenzyl Acetate, Decanal, Citronellol, Isoamyl Allylglycolate, Linalyl Acetate, Anethole, Hydroxycitronellal, Heliotropine, 4-Tert-Butylcyclohexyl Acetate, Methyl Anthranilate, Terpineol Acetate, Gamma-Nonalactone, Geranyl Acetate, Phenethyl Butyrate, Lauraldehyde, Jasmacyclene, Allyl 3-cyclohexylpropionate, Alpha-Ionone, Coumarin, Eugenol, Methyl Ionones, Dimethyl Phenethyl Butyrate, Tricyclodecenyl Propionate, Methylenedioxyphenyl Methylpropanal, Gamma-Undecalactone, Amyl Cinnamal, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Hexyl Cinnamal, Methyl Cedryl Ketone, Phenethyl Phenyl Acetate, Isobutyl Methyl Tetrahydropyranol, Ethylene Brassylate, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Undecanal, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel OilShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to palms and rub together before gently smoothing down damp midshaft and ends, lightly applying remaining product to roots.JVN Tip: Start with a pea sized amount if your hair is finer, straighter or if you just desire less hold. Air dry or diffuse and live your best life. Can also be used on dry hair for day-two frizz freedom.

reviews.headline: This is a winner
reviews.comments: This is the only stying product that's helps my curls not frizz in humidity. I use it along with the JVN conditioning spray. My curls are 3c and hair is grey. If you are on the fence just buy it. I section my hair and use the praying hands method to apply product, works the best for me.

reviews.headline: Will be returning
reviews.comments: Tried once & will be returning. Does everything opposite of what I look for in a leave in conditioner. My hair seems more dry and frizzy after using. It's light and detangles, but that's it.

reviews.headline: So far so good.
reviews.comments: Only used for a week

reviews.headline: My favorite hair product üòç
reviews.comments: I love this stuff sooooo much. It smells so good and is so lightweight in my hair. I use this every time I blow dry or airwrap my hair as a heat protectant and I dont feel like I have to use anything else for hold. Bottle lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: I love the smell
reviews.comments: If you use too much it will make your hair stiff, but the smell is amazing

reviews.headline: 100% worth the money
reviews.comments: I watched JVN's tiktok on how to use this product and it's been 100% worth every penny. I leave my hair pretty wet out of the shower, section it off and rub about a quarter sized amount through each section, run a brush through, scrunch small sections and diffuse.

reviews.headline: I would not repurchase
reviews.comments: Like the feel and smell of the product. Goes on smooth but didn't help the curl and I still had frizz.

reviews.headline: Absolutely obsessed
reviews.comments: I am In disbelief as to how good a product this is and how well it works. I usually use 2-3 products on my hair, and this gets better results with just one product. I have 2B/2C hair, thick and wavy/curly. This product makes my hair soft, shiny, voluminous AND defined all at once. I'm in love and I'll never go back!

reviews.headline: Miracle in a jar
reviews.comments:
I love how my hair feels and looks after using this. 
 So my hair is in a recovery process. I had bleached my hair and became a ash blonde and bleaching my roots every other month to maintain the color completely fried my hair through out time i had to do a big chop and my hair was sooo damaged still i refused to chop it all off. Even when i would do rollers and blow dry my hair, my hair still felt rough like hay. After wearing my hair in a high bun for months my hair grew a inch or two and it feels less roughbut its still rough. I washed my hair and when it was ready to be styled i used a quarter amount rubbed it in with both palms
And worked it into my hair mid hair to ends. I blow dried my hair and flat iron after and my hair feels so healthy no split ends or flying hairs. My hair feels strong, healthy and full. This hair cream is also a heat protector and i love the way it works with heat applied. I recommend this product to anyone that has damaged hair thats trying to grow their hair out or even looking for a good heat protector. This is it. This product has won me as a customer this will be part of my hair regimen for ever. I apply this on damp hair before styling with heat.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments:
I love this product. it makes it so easy to blow dry my hair. It leaves my hair silky and shiny.
I am so glad one of the associates recommended it

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: Only hair oil you'll ever need. It smells amazing and my hair looks so good right away. I love it so much!!

reviews.headline: Not the biggest fan so far
reviews.comments: I really thought this was gonna be an amazing product but so far it's left my hair very dry and stiff, like there's buildup or something. I usually have a leave in product in that makes my hair silky and gives slip, but the second I put this product on my hair it feels stringy. I'm still going to try and work with it but it's just not doing what I hoped it would. The smell is also off. It does not smell good to me at all.

reviews.headline: This Is the Best Hair Oil You'll Ever Use
reviews.comments:
I had pretty high standards for this oil- smell decent, dont leave greasy residue, and dont weigh my hair down. It was up to bat against Redkens Oil For All and Kerastase products. It surpassed all of them. 
This oil is VERY light weight and works perfectly with my very long fine hair. Usually i have issues with strands looking greasy from leave-in products, but the JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops add no stringy appearance, actually supported some bounce in days-old curls, and smoothed out frizz without adding weight. It smells amazing too, but isnt heavily perfumed.

reviews.headline: I am returning this product
reviews.comments: I had such high hopes for this after reading reviews but this air dry cream left my hair very frizzy, dry and hard to style. It did not define my waves or provide a soft, touchable hold as promised.  My hair felt gross so I washed it out the next day! I usually get at least 4-5 days out of my style so I definitely do not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Excellent- controls the frizz
reviews.comments: As I have gotten older my hair has gotten more wavy and frizzy.  I generally air dry and have been searching for an air dry cream that really controls the frizz and JVM does.

reviews.headline: Literally no cons
reviews.comments:
I was such a skeptic, I definitely bought this because of the hype. I'm a little disappointed I did, because I now have an extra product to buy regularly. My hair looks SO good. Its fluffy, its got some volume (i didn't use any volume products, which I usually do because I have a TON of fine, flat hair.) It dried relatively quickly, its got nice texture and it smells nice but very faint, which I appreciate. 

Overall will definitely keep buying. I tried to be constructive but I haven't found anything about it that I dislike. The price also seems reasonable given how little I had to use, and I have a lot of hair.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: This didn't do a good job on frizz and the hair felt stiff. I was a bad choice .

reviews.headline: not for thick hair
reviews.comments:
I've tried this product several times now. I tried it on damp hair, soaking wet hair, light amount, heavy amount, and so many others. I just cant make it work for me. 

I have very very thick 3A hair. I need products with a lot more hold. it's unfortunate because everyone loves it. but it is a huge no for me.

reviews.headline: Do not hesitate
reviews.comments: Love this!! Usually air brush blow out,no more. I am out the now with beautiful hair. Soft,shiny THANK YOU

reviews.headline: Best Hair Cream
reviews.comments: This is the best hair cream ive tried. I always keep coming back to it because it's so good.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love the product it makes my hair feel healthy a great addition to a hair care routine. I just wonder if their is an easier packaging for recycling/ reuse. I noticed that instant recovery serum come in a little glass jar. I've purchased that product before and I thibk it makes for easier to get last bits than this tube. The aluminum is great for being infinitly recycled. I just don't think it's super accessible. Once you have less of the product it get s hard and maybe even jagged. I cut into the tube to get the remaining bits (be super careful if you do this aluminum is sharp!!) and also noticed there was a plastic film on the inside. So maybe it's not the most sustainable option either. This is a plea to change the design of the tube to a glass jar like the recovery serum. I'm aware that might make it harder to tell which is which. You could change to color of the caps to make it easier to differentiate. As a customer who loves jvn I would love to see a more accessible container doe this product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this but the tube ain't it

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love this product. I really do. But I can't recommend it: the sprayer doesn't spray, and definitely not a fine mist. The hole is too small and/or the product is too thick. I prefer to spray a tiny bit of leave-in conditioner (any brand) into my palm and apply with my hands so I can control the amount that actually goes into my hair. But the spray nozzle is useless even using it that way. It clogged after only about three uses. The sprayer gets more and more difficult to use, then it poops out altogether. I can't imagine trying to mist this onto my hair. It's definitely not a fine mist to start with. The spray nozzle has One Job and fails miserably at it. (It's possible to improve the spray a little by rinsing it in hot water and scrubbing in. But consumers shouldn't have to maintain the container a product comes in just to use the product!)
To JVN: I suggest either making the conditioner thinner (and charging less) or using a different kind of spray nozzle, such a a trigger sprayer. Or make it a different formulation altogether, such as a foam.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good product, terrible packaging
